subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Dontrelle Willis yielded two runs in seven innings, Miguel Cabrera drove in two runs and Hanley Ramírez and Dan Uggla each scored twice to help the Marlins beat the Red Sox, 5-2, ending Boston's 12-game winning streak, which matched the third-longest in franchise history.
